definition: to wash one's hair/to have a shampoo
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: She dispenses shampoo into her hands and massages it into my head.
sentences.chinese: 她将洗头液在手里按揉并涂抹到我的头上。

sentences.english: She washed her hair every night and measured how much it grew in a week.
sentences.chinese: 她每晚洗头发，而且量量看一星期长多少。
买洗头液不难，买卫生棉条呢？

sentences.english: I would like a shampoo and set.

sentences.chinese: 有没有人可以帮她洗头发？

sentences.english: Shampoo with baking soda, and rinse with apple cider vinegar.
sentences.chinese: 苏打粉洗头，苹果醋漂洗。

sentences.english: Yucca was used by the Southwest Native Americans for washing their hair.
sentences.chinese: 西南部的印第安人曾用丝兰来洗头发。

sentences.english: Please wash your hair, or at the very least, brush it.
sentences.chinese: 要洗头发，或者至少，你得梳梳。

sentences.english: So, what is the right way of washing the hair?
sentences.chinese: 那么，什么才是洗头的正确方法呢？

sentences.english: Talia came over and washed my hair.
sentences.chinese: 塔莉亚走过来为我洗头发。

sentences.english: Dreadlocks are really hard to wash.
I have used shampoo bed three transferred, the price is cheap, such as a sense of interest replies.
sentences.chinese: 我有二手洗头床三转让，价钱廉价，如感兴味回帖。

sentences.english: She washed her hair with a special coconut oil and slept in a closet.
sentences.chinese: 她有32颗牙，用一种特别的椰子油洗头。

sentences.english: It is wise for you to shampoo your hair often.
sentences.chinese: 你经常用洗发剂洗头是明智的。

sentences.english: Ask the hairdresser for a wash and blow-dry.
sentences.chinese: 要求理发师洗头并吹干定型。

sentences.english: when you're getting ready to hit your pick-up spots, definitely take a shower but DON'T SHAMPOO YOUR HAIR.
sentences.chinese: 当你准备要打理，绝对要洗澡，但不要洗头发。

definition: to condition or dye the hair using hair treatment product in conjunction with a hair steamer
